channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Arrêtez d’acheter des manettes bas de gamme : l’officielle Xbox est bradée pour le Black Friday
item.description: C'est le "standard d'or" du jeu vidéo. Que vous soyez sur PC, sur console ou même sur votre smartphone, la manette Xbox est la référence absolue. Bonne nouvelle : Boulanger a décidé de casser son prix. À moins de 40 euros, c'est le moment de remplacer celle qui a le stick qui dérive.

item.title: AWS is spending $50B build AI infrastructure for the US government
item.description: AWS has been working with the U.S. government since 2011 and is now building AI infrastructure specifically for the entity.

item.title: Get the excellent Google Pixel 9a for its lowest-ever price in Amazon's Black Friday sale
item.description: Get an AI phone for less - grab this Google Pixel 9a Black Friday deal now.

item.title: Anthropic releases Opus 4.5 with new Chrome and Excel integrations
item.description: Anthropic has launched Opus 4.5, the latest version of its flagship model, with new integrations into Chrome and Excel.

item.title: Que se passerait-il si un minitrou noir du Big Bang traversait votre corps ?
item.description: Les trous noirs sont souvent perçus comme des ogres cosmiques pouvant avaler et déchirer des étoiles et des planètes quand ils contiennent au moins quelques masses solaires. La Voie lactée pourrait cependant être baignée dans un gaz de minitrous noirs bien plus légers et petits, produits pendant...

item.title: Roborock Saros 10R : -41 % pour le Black Friday, c’est la meilleure offre aspirateur robot du moment
item.description: Lors de notre test, on lui reprochait surtout son prix. À 1429 euros, le Saros 10R était excellent mais trop cher. Aujourd'hui, Amazon corrige le tir avec une réduction violente de -41 %. Pour un aspirateur laveur capable de franchir des seuils de 4 cm, c'est imbattable.

item.title: A New ‘Fast X’ Report Dives Into Its Director Exit and Ending Changes
item.description: Justin Lin famously left the 'Fast and Furious' sequel days into its shoot and was later replaced by Louis Leterrier.

item.title: Black Friday : le Pixel 9a perd 200 € et devient le roi du milieu de gamme
item.description: C'est la règle non écrite chez Google : ne jamais acheter au lancement. Sorti il y a quelques mois à 549 euros, le Pixel 9a vient de toucher son "vrai" prix pour le Black Friday. À 359 euros, ce smartphone au design radical change complètement de catégorie. C'est simple : il n'a plus aucun concurrent crédible.

item.title: Dust Bunny actor says it's about more than the monsters under the bed – it's about the world trying to convince us that we're alone
item.description: A. conversation with the multi-talented David Dastmalchian

item.title: Les cartes graphiques AMD vont bientôt coûter beaucoup plus cher
item.description: Si vous aviez en tête d'offrir à votre PC une belle carte graphique toute neuve pour Noël, ne tardez pas à l'acheter rapidement. Tout laisse en effet penser que les prix de ces composants vont flamber dans les prochaines semaines. AMD prévoirait une hausse de 10 %… au moins.

item.title: X-energy rides nuclear wave, raises $700M Series D
item.description: The small modular reactor startup is capitalizing on surging interest from tech companies and data center developers.

item.description: This cheap Panasonic soundbar just got a whole lot cheaper thanks to this unbelievable Black Friday deal.

item.title: Prime Video's Black Friday deal gets you AMC+ for just $1.75 - don’t miss the heartbreaking horror movie everyone’s talking about
item.description: AMC+ is at a low price as part of Prime Video's add-on channel deals, and it's too good to miss.

item.title: This is the cheapest Snapdragon X laptop ever launched and I can't believe it's less than $400 for Black Friday
item.description: Dell Inspiron Copilot+ PC with the Snapdragon X processor is now $429.99 for Black Friday.

item.description: Sony's PS-LX310BT turntable is a delightfully cheap record player that's an absolute dream to listen to –once you've set it up

item.title: Indie game developers have a new sales pitch: being ‘AI free’
item.description: Earlier this month, Junghun Lee - CEO of Nexon, the parent company behind current live-service shooter du jour Arc Raiders - made waves in the game development community with a straightforward statement. "It's important to assume that every game company is now using AI," he explained. Indie developers were quick to loudly and vociferously call […]

item.title: HBO Max is offering one of the best Black Friday deals we’ve seen this year
item.description: If you’re thinking of ways to spend time with (or avoid) your family during Thanksgiving or Christmas, you can currently sign up for a year of HBO Max with ads for $2.99 a month ($8 off). The ongoing Black Friday promo is available to both new and returning subscribers, runs until December 1st, and saves […]

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Classic has just hit a lowest-ever price ahead of Black Friday
item.description: Record-low Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Classic deals are dropping for Black Friday, but the watch is so popular that they won't be around for long.

item.title: Le mystérieux appareil d’OpenAI et Jony Ive arrive « dans moins de deux ans »
item.description: Le futur mystérieux appareil IA construit par OpenAI et imaginé par Jony Ive, l'ex-designer en chef d'Apple, pourrait être lancé « dans moins de deux ans » — et des prototypes ont d'ores et déjà été fabriqués.

item.title: Amazon’s Starlink competitor is launching with ‘world’s fastest satellite internet antenna’
item.description: On Monday, Amazon announced Leo Ultra, the first antenna for its satellite internet service, which is launching in a private preview ahead of a commercial rollout sometime next year. Leo Ultra is made for “business and government customers,” unlike the other two, smaller Leo antenna options. No pricing or availability details have been announced, but […]...

item.title: The Xreal One Pro AR glasses are incredible, and over $150-off for Black Friday
item.description: I test XR glasses for a living, and the best ones I've ever tried are cheaper than ever right now.

item.title: A Brilliant, Unconventional Zombie Movie Gets an Equally Brilliant, Unconventional Poster
item.description: Mutant has paired artist 100% Soft with the Japanese horror comedy, 'One Cut of the Dead.'

item.title: ChatGPT’s new Shopping Research tool compares products for you – so you don’t have to open 20 tabs
item.description: ChatGPT now builds custom buyer’s guides in minutes – and it’s available on all for free this holiday season

item.title: Is the housing market at risk as more homeowners slip underwater?
item.description: The share of mortgages that are underwater inches up to 1.6%—still far below the 23% seen in 2009. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.

item.title: Ce pack Arlo avec caméra 2K, projecteur et sonnette est à moitié prix pendant le Black Friday
item.description: Le pack sécurité Arlo avec une caméra connectée Floodlight et une sonnette Full HD est disponible à un excellent prix pendant la Black Friday Week : 142,48 euros, au lieu de 299,99 euros, sur Amazon.

item.title: Aqara’s $99 Wi-Fi smart lock is a good-looking budget option
item.description: Aqara’s latest wireless smart lock features a sleek backlit keypad with support for Amazon Alexa and Google Home for the budget-friendly price of $99.99. With Wi-Fi built in, Aqara’s B50 smart lock doesn’t require a hub and offers a few different unlocking options, including the ability to enter a passcode, use voice commands, control it […]

item.title: Panasonic’s Lumix S9 is a lot of full-frame camera for your money, especially over the Black Friday sales
item.description: The Panasonic Lumix S9 can be picked up in a variety of colors and lens kits, and is aged well following firmware updates and price cuts.

item.title: The best Black Friday MacBook deals to shop right now
item.description: MacBook deals are holding strong as Black Friday sales officially kick off. So far, our favorite finds are from Best Buy and Amazon.

item.description: An integrated, AI-powered head-up display propels Shoei's latest lid into the future and could help reduce rider distractions.

item.title: The Kobo Libra Colour is finally on sale for Black Friday and its now under $200
item.description: As of Nov. 24, the Kobo Libra Colour is down to $199.99. It's our favorite color e-reader and it's now $30 off ahead of Black Friday.

item.title: Porsche Cayenne électrique : 1 156 ch et une recharge éclair pour le SUV de tous les records
item.description: Porsche frappe fort avec son premier Cayenne 100 % électrique. Le plus puissant modèle de son histoire affiche 1 156 ch et une recharge ultra-rapide.

item.description: Black Friday sales from Amazon, Walmart, and Target are already live, and I'm listing everything in my shopping cart, from appliances, tech gadgets, toys, and more.

item.title: COP30: Were this year’s UN climate talks in Brazil a flop?
item.description: The final deal was overall watered-down compared to many conferences in the past decade and fell far short of many delegates’ expectations. This year’s U.N. climate conference in Brazil had many unique aspects that could have been part of a historic outcome.

item.title: The new iPad Pro just crashed to a record-low price, in every screen size and color
item.description: Save some cash on the super-powered iPad Pro with this Black Friday deal, whether you want the 11-inch or 13-inch model.
